item.description:
"Boston area's greatest ski & snowboard season kickoff event, the Boston Globe Ski & Snowboard Expo at the Bayside Expo Center, November 20-23, 2008. Exhibitors from mountain resorts from near and far will be on hand, as well as tour operators and ski & snowboard equipment manufacturers with the latest info on this yearâ€™s best gear."

See the link below for more info. and discount coupon

Boston Ski & Snowboard Expo.

The plan will be to meet at the Newburyport Train Station and take the train to North Station then the T to the Bayside Expo Center. See the link below for directions to Newburyport MBTA Train Station. The Train actually departs at 10:48 sharp. For directions to the Train Station see then link below. NOTE: You can also continue past the Rotary and enter the lot from Rt.1. Newburyport Turnpike

Directions to Newburyport MA Train Station

For Train Tickets you can purchase them at the Whistle Stop Store at the Rt. 1 Rotary or on the Train from the conductor
Cost is $7.75 one way or $15.5 round Trip

Newburyport Line MBTA Saturday Train Schedule

If you would like to save $3 off the $12 at-the-door Entrance Fee you can purchase your Ski & Snowboard Expo. ticket online from the link below

$3 off Admission ticket

We'll make a plan for departing the Expo and discuss it on the Train. Bottom line is we'll need to be on the 6:30pm Train from North Station by otherwise the next train is at 10:15pm
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the Newburyport Train Station before 1:30am
item.name: Boston Ski & Snowboard Expo. at Bayside Expo. Center Boston
